entry.title: A Quiet Confession
entry.summary:
Author: Lilac_Moon1785

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,411Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 3

Summary: Clark is talking to the portrait of Thomas and Martha Wayne, Bruce eavesdrops on his conversation. Bruce overhears about their upcoming child.....Clark is pregnant.
